SEARCH
Package view

Class AdminstratorView

java.lang.Object
view.AdminstratorView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class AdminstratorView extends Object implements View
Represents the administrator's view in the Hospital Management System (HMS). This class implements View interface. Provides methods for managing hospital staff, appointments, and inventory.
Since:
2024-10-27

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminstratorView

      public AdminstratorView()
      Constructs an instance of AdministratorView

  • Method Details

    • handleViewManageStaff

      public static void handleViewManageStaff()
      Handles the viewing and managing of hospital staff. Displays options to view staff, manage staff, or go back.

    • handleListStaff

      public static void handleListStaff()
      Handles the listing of staff with filtering options. Prompts the user to filter staff by gender, role, age range, or view all.

    • listStaffByGender

      public static void listStaffByGender()
      Lists staff filtered by gender. Prompts the user to input a gender and displays the corresponding staff members.

    • listAllStaff

      public static void listAllStaff()
      Lists all staff members without any filters.

    • printStaff

      public static void printStaff(List<Staff> staffList)
      Prints the details of the given staff list in a formatted manner.
      Parameters:
      staffList - List of staff members to be printed.

    • listStaffByRole

      public static void listStaffByRole()
      Lists staff filtered by their role. Displays available roles and shows staff members belonging to the selected role.

    • listStaffByAgeRange

      public static void listStaffByAgeRange()
      Lists staff filtered by their age range. Prompts the user to select an age range and displays corresponding staff members.

    • handleManageStaff

      public static void handleManageStaff()
      Handles the management of hospital staff, including adding and removing staff members.

    • handleAddStaff

      public static void handleAddStaff()
      Prompts the user to add a new staff member to the system. Collects and validates the staff member's name, role, gender, and age, and calls the manager to add the staff.

    • handleRemoveStaff

      public static void handleRemoveStaff()
      Prompts the user to remove a staff member from the system. The user must enter the staff ID of the staff member for validation before removal.

    • handleViewAllPatientsAppointment

      public static void handleViewAllPatientsAppointment()
      Displays all appointments for all patients in the system. If no appointments are found, a message is displayed to indicate this.

    • handleViewManageMedicationInventory

      public static void handleViewManageMedicationInventory()
      Handles viewing and managing the medication inventory. Displays options for viewing the inventory, managing the inventory, or going back.

    • handleManageInventory

      public static void handleManageInventory()
      Manages the inventory of medications, allowing the user to add stock, remove stock, update low stock alerts, or go back to the previous menu.

    • handleApproveReplenishmentRequests

      public static void handleApproveReplenishmentRequests()
      Handles the approval of replenishment requests for medicines that are low in stock. Displays a list of medicines with low stock alerts and prompts the user to approve or deny each request.

    • handleAddNewMedicine

      public static void handleAddNewMedicine()
      Prompts the user to enter details for a new medicine and adds it to the inventory. Collects the medicine's name, quantity, and low stock alert threshold.

    • printViewMenu

      public void printViewMenu()
      Prints the view menu for the administrator, displaying options for managing staff, appointments, inventory, and other functionalities.
      Specified by:
      printViewMenu in interface View

    • handleView

      public void handleView()
      Handles the view of the administrator menu, allowing the user to select different management options until they choose to log out.
      Specified by:
      handleView in interface View

    • viewTitle

      public void viewTitle()
      Displays the title of the administrator menu.
      Specified by:
      viewTitle in interface View
